html: Contrasting the satanic practices of the Perdition category of Jehovah’s people at the extremity of wickedness (vv 3-7) is the redemptive ministry of those who serve as proxy saviors on the seraph level under the terms of the Davidic Covenant. Although Jehovah destroys his alienated people, others who repent he saves “for the sake of my servants”—his “chosen ones”—who answer for their disloyalties in the ancient Near Eastern pattern of vassals to an emperor. Those saved, Jehovah “extracts” and refines like the juice of the grapes and they inherit “mountains” or nations (Isaiah 54:3; 58:14; 60:21).
